channel.title: Audio Device's Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2.4.0
item.description:
2.4.0

  • Updated for Mojave. Please allow app to control Spotify and iTunes on the first start

    • 2.3.9

  • Added autopause when output device changes

    • 2.3.8

  • Autoupdate checkbox added
  • Simplified menu: Quit/Preferences entries will show when Option key is down when clicking on the menu

    • 2.3.7

  • Bugfix - App would launch iTunes/Spotify when unlocking screen

    • 2.3.6

  • Added autopause control to system preferences
  • App no longer crashes when opened outside of the Applications folder

    • 2.3.5

  • AudioDevice can pause Spotify and iTunes when screen is locked. Music will be resumed when screen is unlocked.

    • 2.3.3

  • Mojave update

    • 2.3.1

  • Fixing headphones/speakers switch

    • 2.3

  • Making app fully 64-bit

    • 2.2

  • Added autoupdater
